Title: Gather Your Rosebuds
Description:
Emberthal is quite troubled. It reminds me of a certain bronze dragon when she chose her visage form.

Not to worry! Once Emberthal has returned, we shall throw a proper Visage Day celebration.

The fireworks are to match the colors of the dragonflights.

Each enclave of the city grows special flowers in accordance with that enclave's flight.

Three of each color should be enough for the first batch of fireworks.
ObjectivesText: Collect 3 of each color of Flight Flower in Valdrakken.
